patch.yum:name: kernel
patch.description:
This update to Kernel 2.6.16.21 fixes following security problems: - CVE-2006-3626: Fixed a local root exploit due to a /proc race condition and file mode setting. - CVE-2006-2451: Due to an argument validation error in prctl(PR_SET_DUMPABLE) a local attacker can easily gain administrator (root) privileges. - CVE-2006-2445: run_posix_cpu_timers: remove a bogus BUG_ON() - CVE-2006-3085: xt_sctp: fix endless loop caused by 0 chunk length - CVE-2006-2448: powerpc: Fix machine check problem on 32-bit kernels - CVE-2006-2935: A stack overflow in CDROM handling could be used by physical local attackers to execute code within the kernel.
Additionaly this kernel catches up to the SLE 10 state of the kernel, with massive additional fixes.

Dieses Update auf Kernel 2.6.16.21 behebt folgende Sicherheitsprobleme: - CVE-2006-3626: Fixed a local root exploit due to a /proc race condition and file mode setting. - CVE-2006-2451: Due to an argument validation error in prctl(PR_SET_DUMPABLE) a local attacker can easily gain administrator (root) privileges. - CVE-2006-2445: run_posix_cpu_timers: remove a bogus BUG_ON() - CVE-2006-3085: xt_sctp: fix endless loop caused by 0 chunk length - CVE-2006-2448: powerpc: Fix machine check problem on 32-bit kernels - CVE-2006-2935: A stack overflow in CDROM handling could be used by physical local attackers to execute code within the kernel.
Weiterhin enthält dieses Update alle Änderungen des SLE 10 Kernel.
patch.license-to-confirm:
This update can be used to install a new kernel.
If you decide to use the kernel update, we recommend that you reboot your system upon completion of the online update, as additional kernel modules may be needed which can only be loaded after the system is rebooted.
If you are in the course of performing a new installation, you should deselect this kernel update in order to avoid problems with the hardware detection during the installation.

message.yum:name: kernel-patch-message-2
message.text: If you are using the LILO bootloader, please execute /sbin/lilo after installing the update kernel and prior to rebooting
